Articles.Content:
One thing BetterBurnTime / Basic ΔV / KER / MechJeb / et al are missing:

a way to 'reserve' x amount of ΔV to 'burnback'/deorbit/land a stage.

So what I am asking is an addon with a small footprint that adjusts the active stages ΔV to reserve a set amount of ΔV to deorbit that stage - that 'reserve' amount would not show up in ΔV burn time / available ΔV for that stage. (In a way , like landertrons are not included)

so active stage

  • has 1000 m/s ΔV
  • burnback ΔV is set to 100 m/s ΔV
  • active stage only shows 900 m/s ΔV and any autostage will see only 900 m/s ΔV and stage after 900 m/s ΔV is consumed.

 

stretch would be actually compute required m/s ΔV for destructive deorbit/controlled deorbit/landing deorbit anywhere/

Edited January 26, 2020 by zer0Kerbal
